name: Three Dog's Night
description:
The Mission

Three Dogs Night is a puzzle game where you play as two dogs, Bones and Rex, and a cat named Dog. You must heist a museum and steal the delicious dinosaur bones!

The Plan

Get in, get out. Each member of your team is a specialist. The cat can climb, the big dog is the muscle, and the small dog is small! Use these abilities to your advantage. Move with A and D, climb with W, jump with Spacebar, and swap the current character with Left Mouse Button.

The Owners

The owners of these rambunctious pets and creator of their story are:

  • Vee McGyver, Lead Artist
  • Anna Hudson, Lead Level Designer
  • Josh Arabia, Lead Programmer

Created for the Oakland Homeschool Game Jam, April 22, 2020
